MODIFIED UPON REHEARING
Presiding Justice QUINN delivered the opinion of the court:
The defendant, Kendrick Jefferson (defendant), appeals from an order of the circuit court dismissing his petition for relief under the Post-Conviction Hearing Act (Act) (725 ILCS 5/122-1 et seq. (West 2000)).
